sentences.sentence: Such an embolus will kill your patient.
sentences.translation: 这种栓子可导致病人死亡。

sentences.sentence: The infarction seen here has punctate hemorrhages. This infarct was caused by an embolus.
sentences.translation: 图示梗死为小斑点状出血，梗死由栓子引起。

sentences.sentence: The final recanalization rate, with embolus removal followed by intra-arterial thrombolysis, was 68.3%.
sentences.translation: 当栓子撤除紧接动脉内血栓溶解，最后的再通率是68.3%。
